title: S13 Ep119: Haunted World War II: Soldier Spirits, Ghost Planes, and Strange Synchronicities
itunes:title: Haunted World War II: Soldier Spirits, Ghost Planes, and Strange Synchronicities
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS Time Travels today to witness Haunted World War II: Soldier Spirits, Ghost Planes, and Strange Synchronicities with Matthew L. Swayne

Today you will discover battlefields in Europe and invasion sites in the South Pacific where the spirits of soldiers, sailors, and civilians return again and again to recreate their last moments, unable—or unwilling—to let the past go.

PLUS a NEW Theater of the Mind and a BONUS Classic Theater of the Mind at the end of the show!
